title: Beautiful New Community, Close to Schools, GREAT PRICE! Call Today!
posting_body: This beautiful new community is the perfect place to call home!
We have simplified the home buying process for you.
Everything is done in our Sales Office, from writing your contract to closing and getting your keys!
Plus, we pay your closing costs when you finance with our approved Lender!
🗝Walk in closet in the master bedroom
Click or call now to get started today!
Price $342,900, 5.625% Fixed/6.713% APR, 3.5% Down, FHA 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.
Other fees such as taxes, insurance, and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.
Prices and rates subject to change without notice.
